career.name: Providence St. Joseph Hospital
career.title: Certified Nursing Assistant / Cardiac Monitor
description: Monitoring cardiac rhythms for 50+ patients, assisting with patient care, ensuring timely intervention to enhance outcomes
Collaborating with interdisciplinary teams for comprehensive care, assisting with daily activities, and monitoring vital signs
Vigilantly responding to call lights and phone calls, conducting regular rounds, significantly reducing patient falls on the cardiac floor
